english.segment1: When the morning falls on the farthest hill. I will sing His name, I will praise Him still
english.segment2: When dark trials come and my heart is filled. With the weight of doubt, I will praise Him still
english.segment3: For the Lord, our God, He is strong to save. From the arms of death, from the deepest grave
english.segment4: And He gave us life in His perfect will. And by His good grace I will praise Him still
